title: Rename brand to Electric Light and add static logo in header/footer

requirements.summary: Rename all visible brand/company name text on the single-page home to “Electric Light”.
acceptanceCriteria: About section heading displays “About Electric Light”.
Footer copyright line displays “© <current year> Electric Light. All rights reserved.”

file_operations.description: Replace visible brand text occurrences of “SensorTech Electric” with “Electric Light” in the header branding, About section heading, footer branding, and footer copyright line while keeping the site as a single static home page.

requirements.summary: Add the uploaded logo as a static asset and display it next to the company name in both header and footer branding areas.
acceptanceCriteria: The file Gemini_Generated_Image_x7wtyjx7wtyjx7wt.png is available under frontend/public/assets/generated and can be loaded via the URL /assets/generated/Gemini_Generated_Image_x7wtyjx7wtyjx7wt.png.
Header shows the logo image next to “Electric Light”, with appropriate sizing so it fits within the existing header height on mobile and desktop.
Footer shows the logo image next to “Electric Light”, consistent with header branding.
Logo includes meaningful alt text in English (e.g., “Electric Light logo”).

file_operations.description: Add the uploaded logo file as a static public asset at this exact path so it is served at /assets/generated/Gemini_Generated_Image_x7wtyjx7wtyjx7wt.png.

Update the header and footer branding blocks to render the logo via an using /assets/generated/Gemini_Generated_Image_x7wtyjx7wtyjx7wt.png, placed next to the “Electric Light” text with responsive sizing classes that fit within the existing header/footer heights and include meaningful English alt text (e.g., “Electric Light logo”).

requirements.summary: Update the HTML document title to “Electric Light”.

file_operations.description: Update the <title> text to include the new company name “Electric Light” while keeping the app as a single static home page.
